actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to consumers based on fuel economy.
subjects: Hybrid, electric, and advanced technology vehicles

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an individual taxpayer who operates a passenger automobile or light truck a tax credit based upon the average fuel economy of such vehicle. Terminates the tax credit for alternative motor vehicles.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to consumers based on fuel economy.
